title: Connected Life with Brett Chukerman 10.04.2017 - 8 PM
description:
Brett makes living connected easy with innovative technology and meaningful motivation. This week is all about the Healthy Home. Join experts Ron and Lisa Beres as they gives tips and tricks for a healthier home.
